summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.8°C), outside temperature (down 3.6°C), and inside temperature (down 1.6°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.3 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 323 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 2949 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and a light breeze will be noticeable. Possible light showers, fog or low cloud is expected, and some sunny spells will occur. Weather could become unsettled.
